name: Snake (itch) (PlainCrown)
description:
Basic clone of the classic snake game with a few tweaks and additional features. Made in Godot 3.1. 

Work in progress, barely playable in it's current state.  Missing features that will be added soon:

Re-spawning

Main menu

User interface

Three speed choices

Score and high score display

Music and sound effects

If you'd like to contribute or check out the source code, visit https://github.com/PlainCrown/snake
